title: Immersive Learning Design Based on AR/VR/MR for Healthcare Professional Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Development and implementation of lightweight AR/VR/MR content feasible in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Perform patient diagnosis and treatment procedures step-by-step using AR/VR/MR technologies in medical simulation environments
Safely practice complex medical equipment operation skills via immersive learning tools and apply them to real-world scenarios
Autonomously manage medical knowledge updates and skill development through microlearning modules in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
